page.title: 10EDUCATION IN NEWBOLD
page.content: The{school}building was built in 1875.The walls are made of brick, the roofing material is of tiles. There are 3 main classrooms with 6 other rooms.The junior classroom is 48 square metres,12 times 4.The infants room is 50 square metres, 10 times 5.The other main room is the activity room which is 45 square metres,9 times 5.The other 6 rooms are the kitchen,3 cloakrooms, staffroom and a church store room. In the morning we have to be at school for 9.00 a.m.We have a break at 10.30, dinnertime is from 12.00 to 1.30.The {infants}go home at 3.00 p.m.{Juniors go home at 3.30.We start at Newbold school when we are 4 and leave at 11 years of age.Besides the school we also have a yard and a nature reserve. We have an area of grass which measures 38 metres by 29 metres.
